docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome to the Breaking Point API wiki!

docs.title: About
docs.text: The animation API contains all functions related to animating the local player. (Knife animations)

docs.title: play
docs.text:
Plays an animation that was loaded. (Usually only: raise, stab1, stab2, stab3) 

function bpAPI.animationAPI.play(AnimationName: string, Looped: boolean, Speed: number?)

docs.title: stop
docs.text:
Stops an animation that was loaded and was playing. If no animation name is given, stops all animations. 

function bpAPI.animationAPI.stop(AnimationName: string?)

docs.title: throw
docs.text:
Plays the raising knife animation like it would if you were throwing normally by holding left click. 

function bpAPI.animationAPI.throw()

docs.title: stab
docs.text:
Plays the stab animation the same way it would in-game. (Rotating between stab1 to stab3 every stab) 

function bpAPI.animationAPI.stab()

docs.title: About
docs.text: The Logic API contains all functions related to game mechanics.

docs.title: getDuo
docs.text:
Returns the player which is in duo or in team with the local player. In case the client is not in the duos gamemode, this function always returns false. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.getDuo(): Player | nil | false

docs.title: hasKnife
docs.text:
Returns the given player's or the local player's knife. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.hasKnife(player: Player?): Tool | nil

docs.title: isSit
docs.text:
Returns whether the given player or the local player is sitting. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.isSit(player: Player?): boolean

docs.title: isInGlass
docs.text:
Returns whether a Instance type or a Vector3 is inside of the glass. Returns nil if the object given is neither. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.isInGlass(InstanceOrVector3: Instance | Vector3): boolean | nil

docs.title: hasWon
docs.text:
Returns whether or not the local player has won the game. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.hasWon(): boolean

docs.title: throw
docs.text:
Throws the knife at the given CoordinateFrame. (CFrame) 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.throw(target: CFrame)

docs.title: slash
docs.text:
Fires the stab handler inside of the client script. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.slash()

docs.title: isThrowing
docs.text:
Returns whether or not the local player is in cooldown. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.isThrowing(): boolean

docs.title: allow
docs.text:
Returns whether or not a Character can be attacked. 

function bpAPI.logicAPI.allow(character: Character): boolean
